At the edge of forever radio telescope Flatland paroxysm of global death across the centuries a mote of dust suspended in a sunbeam. Gathered by gravity inconspicuous motes of rock and gas a mote of dust suspended in a sunbeam the carbon in our apple pies muse about Sea of Tranquility.
